text: 3.22: Ro 3.9-19; 3.23; 4.11-12; 4.16; 11.32Fhe Bakɨme buni vhuuiŋ ki gap khaŋ nzuai, “Tɨvi mbatɨgi za kha nuianan ki gumgi gu mbigi kegi.” Fhe Bakɨme fhura mba tɨva garim, mba tɨv hɨgi. Nza maaŋ muuŋgip guigira Zisas Krais khothɨgi gumgi gu mbigi, nza ana khothɨgi ne suaŋv Fhe Bakɨme mba nɨɨn za suaŋgi bigɨn, ana anan nzan nɨɨnga.
